title: NFL ATL: Aldon Smith, NFC risers and fallers
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Aldon Smith, NFC risers and fallers
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- delves into the biggest headlines from around the league, including the developing story surrounding San Francisco 49ers linebacker Aldon Smith’s arrest.  Elsewhere, the gang continues its “Roster Resets” across the NFL, breaking down which teams have seen their stock improve or diminish in the NFC East and NFC South.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
